ygData.subject: Re: Starting smithing...
ygData.msgSnippet: Well the ore isn t a problem -  I was only in Halas to level 6, now I have been everywhere on the continents of Antonica and Odus and some guards even look at
ygData.messageBody:
Well the ore isn't a problem - I was only in Halas to level 6, now I have
been everywhere on the continents of Antonica and Odus and some guards even
look at me kindly in some cities. Thank you for the information, I just
joined this mailing list since I was contemplating starting up
Blacksmithing.

Angarth, Warrior of the 16th Tier
"Periissem ni periisem"


> ----------
> From: Tim West[SMTP:twest@...]
> Reply To: EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com
> Sent: Thursday, June 10, 1999 4:08 PM
> To: EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Starting smithing...
>
> From: "Tim West" <twest@...>
>
>
>
> You will have problems being a Blacksmith because you start in Halas. The
> pieces of ore that you need to make "metal bits" which are the most basic
> thing that you can make, are not availiable on your side of the
> continient.
> With an intelligence of 60, you will take longer to gain skill points, but
> it is still possible. I still find it strange that ore is not availiable
> in Halas, a town and a race of people that would be perfect Blacksmiths.
>
>
> Tanaman-<Aradani>
> 14th Lev. Paladin
> Veeshan Server
>
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> How has ONElist changed your life?
> Share your story with us at http://www.onelist.com
